title: How many noncombatants were needed to prepare a Roman legion for war? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every Decanus had eight combatans and two non combatans. Every ceturion had 80 combatans and 20 non-combatans. Every cohort had 5 centuries so 100 non combatans. There were also non-combatans in the followers camp who were not in military service but essential for the legion.
